description: CMake configuration error: Outdated CMake version requirement in CMakeLists.txt (minimum_required <3.5). CMake compatibility with versions below 3.5 was removed.
Compiler errors in ICU header: Missing C++17 features (std::is_convertible_v, std::u16string_view). Qt5 WebKit components not found during configuration.
CMake policy violation: CMP0002 policy set to OLD behavior is unsupported. Requires migration to NEW policy behavior introduced in CMake 2.6.0.
Type mismatch in function call: Argument 3 of kdump_get_number_attr expects incompatible pointer type (&dd.max_pfn), causing build failure in main.c.
CMake policy CMP0059 set to OLD is invalid (requires NEW behavior). Missing Qt5WebKit and Qt5WebKitWidgets components during configuration.
Missing project version variables: ECM_GENERATE_PRI_FILE requires PROJECT_VERSION_STRING or PROJECT_VERSION via ecm_setup_version().
CMake policy CMP0059 set to OLD is invalid (requires NEW behavior). Configuration aborted due to deprecated policy usage.
CMake policy CMP0059 set to OLD is invalid (requires NEW behavior). Configuration aborted due to deprecated policy usage.
CMake version compatibility error: CMakeLists.txt specifies outdated CMake minimum version (<3.5), which is no longer supported.
CMake version error: Outdated CMake requirement in INSTALL/CMakeLists.txt. Additional failure in test project configuration for time function checks.
